name: Summer's Ride
description:
It's the end of summer. You feel like going somewhere, but not actually arrive anywhere. You are tired but feel nice. You are waiting for whatever will come. You can feel it pleasantly in the air. You are not worried. You watch a train go round in circles.

_____________________________

I know this is not how real trains behave. I made the game nonetheless.

______________________________

Controls:

Space to accelerate train

Scroll mouse to zoom in/out

_______________________________

Features

•  keyboard support

•  Support Windows  7/8/10/11

•  Singleplayer

_______________________________

Download Instructions

•  Download the file

•  Unzip it

•  Open the file and Search for 'Main Game Icon'

•  Create its shortcut on the desktop for easy access

•  Open it

•  Enjoy...

_______________________________
